00050 void sopt_tv_solver(void *xsol,
00051                     int nx1,
00052                     int nx2,
00053                     void (*A)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00054                     void **A_data,
00055                     void (*At)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00056                     void **At_data,
00057                     void *y,
00058                     int ny,
00059                     sopt_tv_param param){
00060     
00061     int i;
00062     int iter;
00063     int nx;
00064     double obj;
00065     double prev_ob;
00066     double rel_ob;
00067     char crit[8];
00068     complex double alpha;
00069     
00070     //Local memory
00071     void *xhat;
00072     void *temp;
00073     void *res;
00074 
00075     //Memory for the TV prox
00076     void *r;
00077     void *s;
00078     void *pold;
00079     void *qold;
00080     void *dx;
00081     void *dy;
00082 
00083     //Memory for L2b prox
00084     void *u2;
00085     void *v2;
00086     
00087     //Initializations
00088     nx = nx1*nx2;
00089     iter = 1;
00090     prev_ob = 0.0;
00091 
00092     if (param.real_out == 1){
00093         //Local
00094         xhat = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00095         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xhat);
00096         //TV prox
00097         r = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00098         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(r);
00099         s = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00100         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(s);
00101         pold = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00102         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(pold);
00103         qold = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00104         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(qold);
00105         dy = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00106         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dy);
00107     }
00108     else {
00109         //Local
00110         xhat = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00111         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xhat);
00112         //TV prox
00113         r = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00114         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(r);
00115         s = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00116         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(s);
00117         pold = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00118         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(pold);
00119         qold = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00120         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(qold);
00121         dy = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00122         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dy);
00123     }
00124 
00125     if (param.real_out == 1 && param.real_meas == 1) {
00126         temp = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00127         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(temp);
00128         dx = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00129         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dx);
00130     }
00131     else {
00132         temp = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00133         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(temp);
00134         dx = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00135         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dx);
00136     }
00137 
00138     if (param.real_meas == 1) {
00139         //Local
00140         res = malloc(ny * sizeof(complex double));
00141         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(res);
00142         //L2b prox
00143         u2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(complex double));
00144         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(u2);
00145         v2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(complex double));
00146         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(v2);
00147     }
00148     else {
00149         //Local
00150         res = malloc(ny * sizeof(complex double));
00151         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(res);
00152         //L2b prox
00153         u2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(complex double));
00154         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(u2);
00155         v2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(complex double));
00156         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(v2);
00157     }
00158 
00159     //xhat = xsol
00160     if (param.real_out == 1){
00161         cblas_dcopy(nx, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)xhat, 1);
00162     }
00163     else{
00164         cblas_zcopy(nx, xsol, 1, xhat, 1);
00165     }
00166     
00167     //Log
00168     if (param.verbose > 1){
00169         printf("TV solver: \n ");
00170     }
00171     //Main loop
00172     while (1){
00173         if (param.verbose > 1){
00174             printf("Iteration %i:\n ", iter);
00175         }
00176         //Projection onto the L2 ball
00177         if (param.real_out == 1 && param.real_meas == 0){
00178             for (i = 0; i < nx; i++){
00179                 *((complex double*)dx + i) = *((double*)xhat + i) + 0.0*I;
00180             }
00181             sopt_prox_l2b(temp, dx, nx, y, ny,
00182                       A, A_data, At, At_data,
00183                       param.epsilon, param.real_meas,
00184                       param.paraml2b, res, u2, v2);
00185             for (i = 0; i < nx; i++){
00186                  *((double*)xsol + i) = creal(*((complex double*)temp + i));
00187             }
00188         }
00189         else {
00190             sopt_prox_l2b(xsol, xhat, nx, y, ny,
00191                       A, A_data, At, At_data,
00192                       param.epsilon, param.real_meas,
00193                       param.paraml2b, res, u2, v2);
00194         }
00195         //Objective evaluation
00196         if (param.real_out == 1){
00197             obj = sopt_utility_tvnormr((double*)xsol, nx1, nx2);
00198         }
00199         else {
00200             obj = sopt_utility_tvnormc((complex double*)xsol, nx1, nx2);
00201         }
00202         
00203         if (obj > 0.0){
00204             rel_ob = fabs(obj-prev_ob)/obj;
00205         }
00206         else if ((fabs(obj-prev_ob) == 0)&&(iter > 1)){
00207             rel_ob = 0.0;
00208         } 
00209         else{
00210             rel_ob = 1.0;
00211         }
00212         
00213         //Log
00214         if (param.verbose > 1){
00215             printf("Objective: obj value = %e, rel obj = %e \n ", obj, rel_ob);
00216         }
00217         //Stopping criteria
00218         if (rel_ob < param.rel_obj){
00219             strcpy(crit, "REL_OBJ");
00220             break;
00221         }
00222         if (iter > param.max_iter){
00223             strcpy(crit, "MAX_ITE");
00224             break;
00225         }
00226         //Proximal TV operator and DR recursion
00227         //xhat = 2*xsol - xhat 
00228         alpha = 2.0 + 0.0*I;
00229         if (param.real_out == 1){
00230             cblas_dscal(nx, -1.0, (double*)xhat,1);
00231             cblas_daxpy(nx, 2.0, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)xhat, 1);
00232         }
00233         else{
00234             cblas_zdscal(nx, -1.0, xhat,1);
00235             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, xsol, 1, xhat, 1);
00236         }
00237         
00238         //Prox TV
00239         sopt_prox_tv(temp, xhat, nx1, nx2, param.gamma, param.real_out,
00240                      param.paramtv, r, s, pold, qold, dx, dy);
00241         
00242         //xhat = temp + xsol - xhat
00243         alpha = 1.0 + 0.0*I;
00244         if (param.real_out == 1){
00245             cblas_daxpy(nx, 1.0, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)temp, 1);
00246             cblas_dscal(nx, -1.0, (double*)xhat,1);
00247             cblas_daxpy(nx, 1.0, (double*)temp, 1, (double*)xhat, 1);
00248         }
00249         else {
00250             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, xsol, 1, temp, 1);
00251             cblas_zdscal(nx, -1.0, xhat,1);
00252             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, temp, 1, xhat, 1);
00253         }
00254         
00255         //Update
00256         iter++;
00257         prev_ob = obj;
00258     }
00259     //Log
00260     if (param.verbose > 0){
00261         //TV norm
00262         printf("\n Solution found \n");
00263         printf("Final TV norm: %e\n ", obj);
00264         //Residual
00265         if (param.real_out == 1 && param.real_meas == 0){
00266             for (i = 0; i < nx; i++){
00267                 *((complex double*)dx + i) = *((double*)xsol + i) + 0.0*I;
00268             }
00269             A(res, dx, A_data);
00270         }
00271         else{
00272             A(res, xsol, A_data);
00273         }
00274         
00275         alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00276         if (param.real_meas == 1){
00277             cblas_daxpy(ny, -1.0, (double*)y, 1, (double*)res, 1);
00278             prev_ob = cblas_dnrm2(ny, (double*)res, 1);
00279         }
00280         else {
00281             cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, y, 1, res, 1);
00282             prev_ob = cblas_dznrm2(ny, res, 1);
00283         }
00284         printf("epsilon = %e, residual = %e\n", param.epsilon, prev_ob);
00285         //Stopping criteria
00286         printf("%i iterations\n", iter);
00287         printf("Stopping criterion: %s \n\n ", crit);
00288     }
00289     
00290     //Free temporary memory
00291     free(xhat);
00292     free(temp);
00293     free(res);
00294 
00295     free(r);
00296     free(s);
00297     free(pold);
00298     free(qold);
00299     free(dx);
00300     free(dy);
00301 
00302     free(u2);
00303     free(v2);
00304 
00305 }

00338 void sopt_tv_sdmm(void *xsol,
00339                     int nx1,
00340                     int nx2,
00341                     void (*A)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00342                     void **A_data,
00343                     void (*At)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00344                     void **At_data,
00345                     void *y,
00346                     int ny,
00347                     double *wt_dx,
00348                     double *wt_dy,
00349                     sopt_tv_sdmmparam param){
00350     
00351     int i;
00352     int iter;
00353     int nx;
00354     double obj;
00355     double prev_ob;
00356     double rel_ob;
00357     double epsilon_up, epsilon_down;
00358     double res;
00359     char crit[8];
00360     complex double alpha;
00361     
00362     //Initializations
00363     nx = nx1*nx2;
00364     
00365     //Local memory
00366     void *x1;
00367     void *s1;
00368     void *z1;
00369     void *x2;
00370     void *s2;
00371     void *z2;
00372     void *x3;
00373     void *s3;
00374     void *z3;
00375 
00376     //Memory for the TV prox
00377     void *pold;
00378     void *qold;
00379     void *dx;
00380     void *dy;
00381     void *xaux;
00382     
00383     if (param.real_data == 1){
00384         //TV
00385         x1 = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00386         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(x1);
00387         s1 = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00388         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(s1);
00389         z1 = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00390         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(z1);
00391 
00392         pold = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00393         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(pold);
00394         qold = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00395         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(qold);
00396         dy = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00397         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dy);
00398         dx = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00399         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dx);
00400         xaux = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00401         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xaux);
00402         
00403         //L2 ball constraint
00404         x2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(double));
00405         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(x2);
00406         s2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(double));
00407         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(s2);
00408         z2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(double));
00409         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(z2);
00410         
00411         //Positivity constraint
00412         x3 = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00413         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(x3);
00414         s3 = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00415         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(s3);
00416         z3 = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00417         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(z3);
00418         
00419     }
00420     else{
00421         //TV
00422         x1 = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00423         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(x1);
00424         s1 = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00425         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(s1);
00426         z1 = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00427         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(z1);
00428 
00429         pold = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00430         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(pold);
00431         qold = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00432         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(qold);
00433         dy = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00434         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dy);
00435         dx = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00436         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dx);
00437         xaux = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00438         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xaux);
00439         
00440         //L2 ball constraint
00441         x2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(complex double));
00442         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(x2);
00443         s2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(complex double));
00444         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(s2);
00445         z2 = malloc(ny * sizeof(complex double));
00446         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(z2);
00447         
00448         //Positivity constraint
00449         x3 = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00450         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(x3);
00451         s3 = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00452         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(s3);
00453         z3 = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00454         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(z3);
00455         
00456     }
00457 
00458         
00459     //Initializations
00460     iter = 1;
00461     prev_ob = 0.0;
00462     epsilon_up = (1.0 + param.epsilon_tol)*param.epsilon;
00463     epsilon_down = (1.0 - param.epsilon_tol)*param.epsilon;
00464     //Lagrange multipliers and dual variables
00465     if (param.real_data == 1){
00466         for (i = 0; i < nx; i++){
00467             *((double*)z1 + i) = 0.0;
00468         }
00469         for (i = 0; i < ny; i++){
00470             *((double*)z2 + i) = 0.0;
00471         }
00472         for (i = 0; i < nx; i++){
00473             *((double*)z3 + i) = 0.0;
00474         }
00475         sopt_utility_projposr((double*)x3, (double*)xsol, nx);
00476         A(x2, x3, A_data);
00477         cblas_dcopy(nx, (double*)x3, 1, (double*)x1, 1);
00478        
00479     }
00480     else{
00481         for (i = 0; i < nx; i++){
00482             *((complex double*)z1 + i) = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00483         }
00484         for (i = 0; i < ny; i++){
00485             *((complex double*)z2 + i) = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00486         }
00487         for (i = 0; i < nx; i++){
00488             *((complex double*)z3 + i) = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00489         }
00490         sopt_utility_projposc((complex double*)x3, (complex double*)xsol, nx);
00491         A(x2, x3, A_data);
00492         cblas_zcopy(nx, x3, 1, x1, 1);
00493         
00494     }
00495     
00496     //Log
00497     if (param.verbose > 1){
00498         printf("TV SDMM solver: \n ");
00499     }
00500     while (1){
00501         //Log
00502         if (param.verbose > 1){
00503             printf("Iteration %i:\n ", iter);
00504         }
00505         //Mixing step
00506         if (param.real_data == 1){
00507             //x1=x1-z1, x2=x2-z2, x3=x3-z3
00508             cblas_daxpy(nx, -1.0, (double*)z1, 1, (double*)x1, 1);
00509             cblas_daxpy(ny, -1.0, (double*)z2, 1, (double*)x2, 1);
00510             cblas_daxpy(nx, -1.0, (double*)z3, 1, (double*)x3, 1);
00511             //x3=x1+At(x2)+x3
00512             At(s3, x2, At_data);
00513             cblas_daxpy(nx, 1.0, (double*)s3, 1, (double*)x3, 1);
00514             cblas_daxpy(nx, 1.0, (double*)x1, 1, (double*)x3, 1);
00515             //Conjugate gradient solver
00516             sopt_utility_cgsolr((double*)xsol,
00517                             (double*)x3, 
00518                             (double*)x2,
00519                             (double*)x1,
00520                             (double*)s1,
00521                             (double*)s3,
00522                             A, 
00523                             A_data,
00524                             At, 
00525                             At_data,
00526                             nx, 
00527                             ny,
00528                             param.cg_tol,
00529                             param.cg_max_iter,
00530                             param.verbose);
00531             
00532         }
00533         else {
00534             //x1=x1-z1, x2=x2-z2, x3=x3-z3
00535             alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00536             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, z1, 1, x1, 1);
00537             cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, z2, 1, x2, 1);
00538             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, z3, 1, x3, 1);
00539             //x3=x1+At(x2)+x3
00540             At(s3, x2, At_data);
00541             alpha = 1.0 + 0.0*I;
00542             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, s3, 1, x3, 1);
00543             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, x1, 1, x3, 1);
00544             //Conjugate gradient solver
00545             sopt_utility_cgsolc((complex double*)xsol,
00546                             (complex double*)x3, 
00547                             (complex double*)x2,
00548                             (complex double*)x1,
00549                             (complex double*)s1,
00550                             (complex double*)s3,
00551                             A, 
00552                             A_data,
00553                             At, 
00554                             At_data,
00555                             nx, 
00556                             ny,
00557                             param.cg_tol,
00558                             param.cg_max_iter,
00559                             param.verbose);
00560             
00561         }
00562         
00563         //Objective and residual evaluation
00564         
00565         if (param.real_data == 1){
00566             obj = sopt_utility_wtvnormr((double*)xsol, wt_dx, wt_dy, nx1, nx2);
00567         }
00568         else {
00569             obj = sopt_utility_wtvnormc((complex double*)xsol, wt_dx, wt_dy, nx1, nx2);
00570         }
00571     
00572         if (obj > 0.0){
00573             rel_ob = fabs(obj-prev_ob)/obj;
00574         }
00575         else if ((fabs(obj-prev_ob) == 0)&&(iter > 1)){
00576             rel_ob = 0.0;
00577         } 
00578         else{
00579             rel_ob = 1.0;
00580         }
00581         //Residual
00582         //x2=A(xsol)-y
00583         A(x2, xsol, A_data);
00584         alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00585         if (param.real_data == 1){
00586             cblas_dcopy(ny, (double*)x2, 1, (double*)s2, 1);
00587             cblas_daxpy(ny, -1.0, (double*)y, 1, (double*)x2, 1);
00588             res = cblas_dnrm2(ny, (double*)x2, 1);
00589         }
00590         else {
00591             cblas_zcopy(ny, x2, 1, s2, 1);
00592             cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, y, 1, x2, 1);
00593             res = cblas_dznrm2(ny, x2, 1);
00594         }
00595         //Log
00596         if (param.verbose > 1){
00597             printf("Objective: TV norm = %e, rel obj = %e \n ", obj, rel_ob);
00598             printf("Residual: epsilon = %e, residual = %e \n ", param.epsilon, res);
00599         }
00600         //Stopping criteria
00601         if (rel_ob < param.rel_obj && res >= epsilon_down && res <= epsilon_up){
00602             strcpy(crit, "REL_OBJ");
00603             break;
00604         }
00605         if (iter > param.max_iter){
00606             strcpy(crit, "MAX_ITE");
00607             break;
00608         }
00609 
00610         //TV update
00611         //x1=Psit(xsol)
00612         if (param.real_data == 1){
00613             //z1=z1+xsol
00614             cblas_daxpy(nx, 1.0, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)z1, 1);
00615             //x1=prox_TV(z1).
00616             //sopt_prox_tv(x1, z1, nx1, nx2, param.gamma, param.real_data,
00617                      //param.paramtv, s1, s3, pold, qold, dx, dy);
00618             sopt_prox_wtv(x1, z1, nx1, nx2, param.gamma, param.real_data,
00619                          param.paramtv, wt_dx, wt_dy, s1, s3, xaux, pold, qold, dx, dy);
00620             //z1=z1-x1
00621             cblas_daxpy(nx, -1.0, (double*)x1, 1, (double*)z1, 1);  
00622             //Log
00623             if (param.verbose > 1){
00624                 cblas_dcopy(nx, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)s1, 1);
00625                 cblas_daxpy(nx, -1.0, (double*)x1, 1, (double*)s1, 1);
00626                 res = cblas_dnrm2(nx, (double*)s1, 1);
00627                 printf("Primal residual r1 = %e \n ", res);
00628             } 
00629         }
00630         else {
00631             //z1=z1+xsol
00632             alpha = 1.0 + 0.0*I;
00633             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, xsol, 1, z1, 1);
00634             //x1=prox_TV(z1). 
00635             //sopt_prox_tv(x1, z1, nx1, nx2, param.gamma, param.real_data,
00636                      //param.paramtv, s1, s3, pold, qold, dx, dy);
00637             sopt_prox_wtv(x1, z1, nx1, nx2, param.gamma, param.real_data,
00638                          param.paramtv, wt_dx, wt_dy, s1, s3, xaux, pold, qold, dx, dy);
00639             //z1=z1-x1
00640             alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00641             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, x1, 1, z1, 1);
00642             //Log
00643             if (param.verbose > 1){
00644                 cblas_zcopy(nx, xsol, 1, s1, 1);
00645                 alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00646                 cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, x1, 1, s1, 1);
00647                 res = cblas_dznrm2(nx, s1, 1);
00648                 printf("Primal residual r1 = %e \n ", res);
00649             }
00650             
00651         }
00652         //L2 ball constraint update
00653         //x2=A(xsol)-y
00654         
00655         if (param.real_data == 1){
00656             //z2=z2+x2
00657             cblas_daxpy(ny, 1.0, (double*)x2, 1, (double*)z2, 1);
00658             
00659             //x2=prox_L2b(z2), projection onto the epsilon L2
00660             //constraint
00661             //x2=y+res*z2
00662             res = cblas_dnrm2(ny, (double*)z2, 1);
00663             res = min(1.0,param.epsilon/res);
00664             cblas_dcopy(ny, (double*)y, 1, (double*)x2, 1);
00665             cblas_daxpy(ny, res, (double*)z2, 1, (double*)x2, 1);
00666             //remove y to get z2=z2+A(xsol)
00667             cblas_daxpy(ny, 1.0, (double*)y, 1, (double*)z2, 1);
00668 
00669             //z2=z2-x2
00670             cblas_daxpy(ny, -1.0, (double*)x2, 1, (double*)z2, 1); 
00671             //Log
00672             if (param.verbose > 1){
00673                 cblas_daxpy(ny, -1.0, (double*)x2, 1, (double*)s2, 1);
00674                 res = cblas_dnrm2(ny, (double*)s2, 1);
00675                 printf("Primal residual r2 = %e \n ", res);
00676             }
00677    
00678         }
00679         else {
00680             //z2=z2+x2
00681             alpha = 1.0 + 0.0*I;
00682             cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, x2, 1, z2, 1);
00683             //x2=prox_L2b(z2), projection onto the epsilon L2
00684             //constraint
00685             //x2=y+res*z2
00686             res = cblas_dznrm2(ny, z2, 1);
00687             res = min(1.0,param.epsilon/res);
00688             cblas_zcopy(ny, y, 1, x2, 1);
00689             alpha = res + 0.0*I;
00690             cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, z2, 1, x2, 1);
00691             //remove y to get z2=z2+A(xsol)
00692             alpha = 1.0 + 0.0*I;
00693             cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, y, 1, z2, 1);
00694             //z2=z2-x2
00695             alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00696             cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, x2, 1, z2, 1); 
00697             //Log
00698             if (param.verbose > 1){
00699                 alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00700                 cblas_zaxpy(ny, (void*)&alpha, x2, 1, s2, 1);
00701                 res = cblas_dznrm2(ny, s2, 1);
00702                 printf("Primal residual r2 = %e \n ", res);
00703             }
00704             
00705         }
00706         //Positivity constraint update
00707         if (param.real_data == 1){
00708             //z3=z3+xsol
00709             cblas_daxpy(nx, 1.0, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)z3, 1);
00710             //x3=prox_p(z2), projection onto the positive orthant
00711             sopt_utility_projposr((double*)x3, (double*)z3, nx);
00712             //z3=z3-x3
00713             cblas_daxpy(nx, -1.0, (double*)x1, 1, (double*)z1, 1); 
00714             //Log
00715             if (param.verbose > 1){
00716                 cblas_dcopy(nx, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)s3, 1);
00717                 cblas_daxpy(nx, -1.0, (double*)x3, 1, (double*)s3, 1);
00718                 res = cblas_dnrm2(nx, (double*)s3, 1);
00719                 printf("Primal residual r3 = %e \n ", res);
00720             }
00721             
00722         }
00723         else {
00724              //z3=z3+xsol
00725             alpha = 1.0 + 0.0*I;
00726             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, xsol, 1, z3, 1);
00727             //x3=prox_p(z2), projection onto the positive orthant
00728             sopt_utility_projposc((complex double*)x3, (complex double*)z3, nx);
00729             //z3=z3-x3
00730             alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00731             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, x3, 1, z3, 1); 
00732             //Log
00733             if (param.verbose > 1){
00734                 cblas_zcopy(nx, xsol, 1, s3, 1);
00735                 alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00736                 cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, x3, 1, s3, 1);
00737                 res = cblas_dznrm2(nx, s3, 1);
00738                 printf("Primal residual r3 = %e \n ", res);
00739             }
00740             
00741         }
00742         
00743         //Update
00744         iter++;
00745         prev_ob = obj;
00746     }
00747     
00748     //Log
00749     if (param.verbose > 0){
00750         //TV norm
00751         printf("Solution found \n");
00752         printf("Final TV norm: %e\n ", obj);
00753         //Residual
00754         printf("epsilon = %e, residual = %e\n", param.epsilon, res);
00755         //Stopping criteria
00756         printf("%i iterations\n", iter);
00757         printf("Stopping criterion: %s \n\n ", crit);
00758     }
00759     
00760     //Free temporary memory
00761     free(x1);
00762     free(x2);
00763     free(x3);
00764     free(s1);
00765     free(s2);
00766     free(s3);
00767     free(z1);
00768     free(z2);
00769     free(z3);
00770     free(pold);
00771     free(qold);
00772     free(dx);
00773     free(dy);
00774     free(xaux);
00775 
00776 }
00777 
00818 void sopt_tv_rwsdmm(void *xsol,
00819                     int nx1,
00820                     int nx2,
00821                     void (*A)(void *out, void *in, void **data),
00822                     void **A_data,
00823                     void (*At)(void *out, void *in, void **data),
00824                     void **At_data,
00825                     void *y,
00826                     int ny,
00827                     sopt_tv_sdmmparam paramtv,
00828                     sopt_tv_rwparam paramrwtv){
00829     
00830     int iter;
00831     int i;
00832     int nx = nx1*nx2;
00833     double dist;
00834     double rel_dist;
00835     double delta;
00836     complex double alpha;
00837     char crit[8];
00838     double *wt_dx;
00839     double *wt_dy;
00840     void *dx;
00841     void *dy;
00842     void *sol_old;
00843     
00844     wt_dx = (double*)malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00845     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(wt_dx);
00846     wt_dy = (double*)malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00847     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(wt_dy);
00848 
00849     
00850     if (paramtv.real_data == 1){
00851         sol_old = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00852         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sol_old);
00853         dx = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00854         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dx);
00855         dy = malloc(nx * sizeof(double));
00856         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dy);
00857         
00858     }
00859     else {
00860         sol_old = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00861         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sol_old);
00862         dx = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00863         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dx);
00864         dy = malloc(nx * sizeof(complex double));
00865         SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dy);
00866     }
00867     
00868     strcpy(crit, "MAX_ITE");
00869     
00870     //Initial solution
00871     if (paramrwtv.init_sol == 0){
00872         //xsol = 0;
00873         alpha = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00874         if (paramtv.real_data == 1){
00875             for (i=0; i < nx; i++){
00876                 *((double*)xsol + i) = 0.0;
00877             }
00878         }
00879         else {
00880             for (i=0; i < nx; i++){
00881                 *((complex double*)xsol + i)  = alpha;
00882             }
00883         }
00884         //weights = 1;
00885         for (i = 0; i < nx; i++){
00886             wt_dx[i] = 1.0;
00887             wt_dy[i] = 1.0;
00888         }
00889         sopt_tv_sdmm(xsol, nx1, nx2,
00890                      A, A_data, At, At_data,
00891                      y, ny, wt_dx, wt_dy, paramtv);
00892         
00893     }
00894     if (paramtv.real_data == 1){
00895         sopt_utility_projposr((double*)xsol, (double*)xsol, nx);
00896     }
00897     else{
00898         sopt_utility_projposc((complex double*)xsol, (complex double*)xsol, nx);
00899     }
00900     //Setting delta
00901     delta = 0.0;
00902     alpha = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00903     
00904     if (paramtv.real_data == 1){
00905         for (i=0; i < nx; i++){
00906             delta += *((double*)xsol + i);
00907         }
00908     }
00909     else {
00910         for (i=0; i < nx; i++){
00911             alpha += *((complex double*)xsol + i);
00912         }
00913     }
00914     
00915     delta = delta/nx;
00916     alpha = alpha/nx;
00917     if (paramtv.real_data == 1){
00918         for (i=0; i < nx; i++){
00919             *((double*)sol_old + i) = *((double*)xsol + i) - delta;
00920         }
00921     }
00922     else {
00923         for (i=0; i < nx; i++){
00924             *((complex double*)sol_old + i)  = *((complex double*)xsol + i) - alpha;
00925         }
00926     }
00927     
00928     if (paramtv.real_data == 1){
00929         delta = cblas_dnrm2(nx, (double*)sol_old, 1);
00930     }
00931     else{
00932         delta = cblas_dznrm2(nx, sol_old, 1);
00933     }
00934     
00935     delta = delta/sqrt(nx);
00936     
00937     for (iter=1; iter <= paramrwtv.max_iter; iter++){
00938         //Verbose and check delta
00939         delta = max(paramrwtv.sigma, delta);
00940         
00941         //Update weights
00942         if (paramtv.real_data == 1){
00943             sopt_utility_gradientr((double*)dx, (double*)dy, (double*)xsol, nx1, nx2);
00944             for (i=0; i < nx; i++){
00945                 *(wt_dx + i) = delta/(delta + fabs(*((double*)dx + i)));
00946                 *(wt_dy + i) = delta/(delta + fabs(*((double*)dy + i)));
00947             }
00948         }
00949         else {
00950             sopt_utility_gradientc((complex double*)dx, (complex double*)dy, (complex double*)xsol, nx1, nx2);
00951             for (i=0; i < nx; i++){
00952                 *(wt_dx + i) = delta/(delta + cabs(*((complex double*)dx + i)));
00953                 *(wt_dy + i) = delta/(delta + cabs(*((complex double*)dy + i)));
00954             }
00955         }
00956         
00957         //sol_old = xsol
00958         if (paramtv.real_data == 1){
00959             cblas_dcopy(nx, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)sol_old, 1);
00960         }
00961         else{
00962             cblas_zcopy(nx, xsol, 1, sol_old, 1);
00963         }
00964         
00965         //Log
00966         if (paramrwtv.verbose > 1){
00967             printf("RW iteration: %i\n", iter);
00968         }
00969         
00970         //Solve TV problem
00971         sopt_tv_sdmm(xsol, nx1, nx2,
00972                      A, A_data, At, At_data,
00973                      y, ny, wt_dx, wt_dy, paramtv);
00974         
00975         if (paramtv.real_data == 1){
00976             sopt_utility_projposr((double*)xsol, (double*)xsol, nx);
00977         }
00978         else{
00979             sopt_utility_projposc((complex double*)xsol, (complex double*)xsol, nx);
00980         }
00981         
00982         //Update variables and relative distance computation
00983         delta = delta/10;
00984         alpha = -1.0 + 0.0*I;
00985         if (paramtv.real_data == 1){
00986             rel_dist = cblas_dnrm2(nx, (double*)sol_old, 1);
00987             cblas_daxpy(nx, -1.0, (double*)xsol, 1, (double*)sol_old, 1);
00988             dist = cblas_dnrm2(nx, (double*)sol_old, 1);
00989         }
00990         else{
00991             rel_dist = cblas_dznrm2(nx, sol_old, 1);
00992             cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, xsol, 1, sol_old, 1);
00993             dist = cblas_dznrm2(nx, sol_old, 1);
00994         }
00995         rel_dist = dist/rel_dist;
00996         //Log
00997         if (paramrwtv.verbose > 1){
00998             printf("Relative distance: %e \n\n ", rel_dist);
00999         }
01000         //Stopping criteria
01001         if (rel_dist < paramrwtv.rel_var){
01002             strcpy(crit, "REL_DIS");
01003             break;
01004         }
01005         
01006     }
01007     
01008     free(wt_dx);
01009     free(wt_dy);
01010     free(dx);
01011     free(dy);
01012     free(sol_old);
01013     
01014     if (paramrwtv.verbose > 0){
01015         printf("Solution found \n");
01016         //Stopping criteria
01017         printf("%i RW iterations\n", iter);
01018         printf("Stopping criterion: %s \n\n ", crit);
01019     }
01020     
01021 }
